Package org.javascool.proglets.game

Interface Summary
Drawable This interface defines an object that can be drawn to a buffer
EventCatcher This interface defines an object that can tell the manager if it wants to catch an event.
 

Class Summary
Accessible  
EventListener This class stores an event : it contains a callback method that will be called if the event is triggered and an EventCatcher that should be asked if the event concerns it.
Functions Main class for this proglet, it implements EventCatcher to allow it to catch events : is you simply use onClick("exit"); Functions will be used as EventCatcher (but it always return true and catches the event when triggered)
Functions.Clock This class allows the proglet to trigger events regularly.
Geometry This class is parent of all the objects that are rectangular, that can be placed on the proglet's panel and recieve events if the mouse pointer is above them.
Group  
GroupIterator  
Key  
Line This class allows the end-user to draw and manipulate an oval
LinkedEventGroup This class allows the objects to recieve events with the syntax : object.onClick("callbackFunction"); The callback function is added to the global register of callback functions for this event associated with this, which implements EventCatcher so that the object can decide if it wants to catch the event or not.
Oval This class allows the end-user to draw and manipulate an oval
Panel Defines the proglet's main panel and render area
Rect This class allows the end-user to draw and manipulate an rect
Sprite This class defines a sprite that can be drawn in the render area and addressed events
State Superclass of all the states.
StoredProperty
